product_name: Slackline Industries Baseline Slackline with TreePro and Instructional DVD - 50 ft.
long_description: This 2 in.-wide slackline is designed as an easy-to-use kit with slackline-specific webbing for all levels of users. The thick weave makes it ideal for walking or getting started with tricks.
short_description: This 2 in.-wide slackline is designed as an easy-to-use kit with slackline-specific webbing for all levels of users. The thick weave makes it ideal for walking or getting started with tricks.
